body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Pets Up to 1300 Sq Ft, MOOKA H13 True HEPA Air Purifier Cleaner with 360° Air Inlet, Fragrance, 13dB Air Purifier for Bedroom Wildfire Smoke Pet Dust Pollen Odor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 40 mins
features: [Say Goodbye to Polluted Air] MOOKA BP-S0610L air purifier adopts 360° air intake and 2024 upgraded vortex technology which can effectively filter various polluted odors, capture dust and release fresh air. The air purifier for home covers an area of up to 1300ft², with 4 air changes per hour in 325ft². Modern design fits any space and is perfect for adults, pets, children, the elderly, and anyone who wants to improve air quality.

[H13 High-Performance Filtration] The air purifier for home pets uses a true H13 HEPA filter with a 3-stage purification system - pre-filter, H13 and high-efficiency activated carbon filter, which effectively captures pet hair, dander, dust, pollen, smoke and other large particles, alleviate discomfort caused by air pollutants and provide you with a clean and healthy air environment.

[Ozone-Free & Aromamed Relaxation] UV-C produces high concentrations of ozone, which is harmful to children, asthmatics and pets. This air purifier for home large room uses only high-quality filtration, 100% BPA-free and ozone-free. The air purifier has an aromatherapy function, imaging 4-5 drops of essential oils into an aromatherapy pad and as the machine runs, the clean and fragrant airflow will spread to make you feel relaxed better.

[Quiet, User-Friendly Features] With a noise level as low as 15 dbs, this air purifier for bedroom is so quiet that you don’t have to worry about falling asleep to a rattling sound or a loud buzzing sound. We also have customizable functions, you can choose a night light, 3 fan speeds to choose the appropriate gear, 3 timing modes to flexibly set the use time, and a child lock function to prevent babies or pets from accidentally touching the buttons, making your life more convenient and secure.

[Always High Quality] The room air purifiers is equipped with a filter replacement reminder function. For the health of you and your family, please use genuine MOOKA replacement filters (search B0BR5BJG4J) to maintain optimal performance and ensure that the product you purchase is worth your money. Note that the power adapter is placed inside the filter at the bottom. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and quiet.
reviews.reviewText: Impressive, filter 3 stage Hepa, and the airflow is great and very quiet. Just looked and "official" Mooka Replacement filters, are like $46 bucks, but you can get the same on amazon from others for like $22. Instructions say change every 3 - 6 months. Me being a smoker (trying to quit), I will probably change every 4-5 months. The blue light is a nice touch. The aromatherapy diffuser doesn't seem to be doing much for me, and I soaked the hell out of that pad. I noticed there is no holes at the bottom for air to flow through the pad, so I guess suction from air passing over is suppose to move the aroma. I am tempted to drill a few tiny holes, maybe heat up a needle and poke some tiny holes, I'm not sure yet. I can live without that part anyway. Plus me being a smoker, I may just not be noticing it. Anyway, I like this product, and may get a couple more for two other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked quickly and efficiently
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been wanting to get an air purifier for my home because of lingering cooking smells and just a general musty odor. I decided to give it a shot the other night when making dinner. The whole 1st floor smelled strongly of garlic and onions, so I figured it was a good starting point. After 10 minutes of running the food smell cleared away. Even after having to leave the house for a while, when I came back it didn’t smell. I also ran it overnight and noticed a massive difference the next morning in that the room didn’t smell musty anymore. The instructions are clear and this is very easy to operate. It’s not too loud on the highest setting and would be great to have in a bedroom as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the blue night light
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier works great, I love how compact it is so it's great to sit on a shelf, bookcase etc. It may be small but it's mighty, the timer function works great, and the night light is genius. The night light is blue light and can be turned on or off while the machine is running I prefer on because it provides a nice ambiance. We keep air purifiers in our home since we have a pet and this one is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Air Filter
reviews.reviewText: This will be used in a multi-pet household. There is no possible way to keep a home like mine 100% fur free. There has got to be dander and hair all around us most of the time. I just know that this good sized air filter will help clean the air and help us maintain a healthier household.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far this air purifier is working good. I am currently running it on low but with 2 dogs in the house who run in and out all day I will be turning it up. It runs quietly, which is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good. Simple to use.
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to set up. The directions are simple to understand. It's been running for about a week at my house and seems to be keeping the dog smell down. We have ordered some essentials oils to use in it as well. We keep it on low because it is a little noise on high.
